name: this is you
description:
This is a game about my self-discovery of who I am and who I were to become over just about two years as of this point. It covers from January of 2013 to the present day.

It's all text, no real "gameplay" and all meant to hopefully be emotional as it covers what I've dealt with the past few years.

All of these events that are covered are true, with some words potentially changed due to not remembering events exactly, and some small stuff that isn't as important left out.

The game is relatively long, just in terms of how many passages it is, though overall each passage is pretty short.

If you try it out I hope you get something out of it in some way.

Edit 8/12/2015: As of now, I am opening this as my only current game open for tips/donations. 12 days ago I started hormones, and I'm opening this game up for tips/donations to potentially get money for clothes and makeup and other necessities for my transition to help me out. If you donate, I thank you very, very much.

Potential content warning of transphobia and depression
